text: Afonso Augusto Moreira Pena (; 30 November 1847 â€“ 14 June 1909) was a Brazilian politician who served as President of Brazil between 1906 and 1909.Afonso Pena - BrasilEscola He was the first president to die in office. Pena died of pneumonia on 14 June 1909. ==References== Category:1847 births Category:1909 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Vice presidents of Brazil Category:Presidents of Brazil Category:Politicians from Minas Gerais
